lead_paragraph: Angela Stanford shot a career-best 10-under 62 to break the Prospector Course record and take a three-stroke lead over the defending champion Lorena Ochoa in the Safeway International in Superstition Mountain, Ariz.
snippet: Angela Stanford shot a career-best 10-under 62 to break the Prospector Course record and take a three-stroke lead over the defending champion Lorena Ochoa in the Safeway International in Superstition Mountain, Ariz.
